With wide vertical and horizontal angles, you can see this TV from anywhere in the room. Note: You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of this TV. items.shortDescription: Enjoy the crystal clear picture of Sceptre's E205 LED HDTV series. The compact design allows you to utilize the display in any space. Most compact displays are equipped with the bare minimum, but the E205 LED HDTV has an unrivaled arsenal of state-of-the art features including a built-in DVD player, HDMI input, VGA, USB port, and headphone output.<br><br><b>Note:</b> You must have a source of HD programming in order to take full advantage of the Sceptre 20" LED HDTV. Contact your local cable or satellite TV provider for details on how to upgrade.
